org.apache.giraph.utils

类 PairList<U,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.PairList<U,V>
  • 类型参数:
    U - Type of the first element in a pair
    V - Type of the second element in a pair

    public class PairList<U,V>
extends Object
    Collection to keep pairs in, without creating a wrapper object around each pair of objects.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  PairList.Iterator
      Special iterator class which we'll use to iterate through elements of PairList, without having to create new object as wrapper for each pair.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected List<U> firstList
      List to keep first elements of pairs in
      protected List<V> secondList
      List to keep second elements of pairs in

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PairList()
      Constructor

    • 方法概要

      Add a pair to the collection.

      Get iterator through elements of this object.

      Get number of pairs in this list.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize the inner state. Must be called before add() is called.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(int size)
        Initialize the inner state, with a known size. Must be called before add() is called.
        参数:
        size - Number of pairs which will be added to the list

      • add

        public void add(U first,
       V second)
        Add a pair to the collection.
        参数:
        first - First element of the pair
        second - Second element of the pair

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Get number of pairs in this list.
        返回:
        Number of pairs in the list

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Check if the list is empty.
        返回:
        True iff there are no pairs in the list

      • getIterator

        public PairList.Iterator getIterator()
        Get iterator through elements of this object.
        返回:
        PairList.Iterator iterator
